name: Summer Restaurant Week
description: Enjoy special menus at extraordinary prices at favorite Downtown Schenectady restaurants, featuring diverse cuisines and unique dining experiences.

name: The Alec Lewis Group Performance
venue: Wolf Hollow Brewing Company, Glenville, NY
description: Experience a fresh mix of contemporary funk, classic rock, and blues with The Alec Lewis Group, fronted by local musician Alec Lewis, featuring original compositions.
